001package edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.controller;
002
003import android.os.Bundle;
004import android.view.LayoutInflater;
005import android.view.View;
006import android.view.ViewGroup;
007import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
008import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
009import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
010import androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner;
011import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
012import androidx.navigation.Navigation;
013import com.google.android.gms.auth.api.signin.GoogleSignInAccount;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.R;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.viewmodel.LoginViewModel;
016import java.util.Timer;
017import java.util.TimerTask;
018
019public class PreLoginFragment extends Fragment {
020
021  private LoginViewModel viewModel;
022  private View root;
023
024  @Nullable
025  @Override
026  public View onCreateView(@NonNull LayoutInflater inflater, @Nullable ViewGroup container,
027      @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
028    root = inflater.inflate(R.layout.fragment_pre_login, container, false);
029    return root;
030  }
031
032  @Override
033  public void onViewCreated(@NonNull View view, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
034    super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
035    Timer timer = new Timer();
036    timer.schedule(new TimerTask() {
037      @Override
038      public void run() {
039        checkLoginState();
040      }
041    }, 3000);
042  }
043
044  private void checkLoginState() {
045    viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(requireActivity()).get(LoginViewModel.class);
046    LifecycleOwner owner = getViewLifecycleOwner();
047    viewModel.getAccount().observe(owner, this::handleAccount);
048    viewModel.getRefreshThrowable().observe(owner, this::handleThrowable);
049    viewModel.refresh();
050  }
051
052  private void handleAccount(GoogleSignInAccount account) {
053    if (account != null) {
054      Navigation.findNavController(root)
055          .navigate(PreLoginFragmentDirections.navigateToImageFragment());
056    }
057  }
058
059  private void handleThrowable(Throwable throwable) {
060    if (throwable != null) {
061      Navigation.findNavController(root)
062          .navigate(PreLoginFragmentDirections.navigateToLoginFragment());
063    }
064  }
065}
